verses.name: Exodus 32:3
verses.text: And all the people brake off the golden earrings which were in their ears, and brought them unto Aaron.

verses.name: Exodus 32:4
verses.text: And he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Exodus 32:5
verses.text: And when Aaron saw it, he built an altar before it; and Aaron made proclamation, and said, To morrow is a feast to the Lord.
